```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(gssr)
data(gss_all)
```

```{r}
gss_data <- gss_all %>%
  select(year, wordsum, educ) %>%
  filter(!is.na(wordsum) & !is.na(educ))
```

```{r}
ggplot(gss_data, aes(x = educ, y = wordsum, color = factor(year))) +
  geom_jitter(alpha = 0.3) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  labs(title = "Relationship between Wordsum and Education Level Has Decreased Over Time",
       x = "Education Level (Years)",
       y = "Wordsum Score",
       color = "Year") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
